commands.name: msg!support
commands.desc:
Gives you the bot's server link.
Format: `msg!support`

commands.name: msg!invite
commands.desc:
Gives you the bot's invite.
Format: `msg!afk (status)`

commands.name: msg!ping
commands.desc:
Checks your connection speed to the bot.
Format: `msg!ping`

commands.name: msg!avatar
commands.desc:
Gets a link to your avatar./nFormat: `msg!avatar`
PLANNED MAINTENENCE ON THIS COMMAND SOON

commands.name: msg!echo
commands.desc: Repeats a message back to you./nFormat: `msg!echo (message)`

dev.name: msg!announce
dev.desc:
**DEVELOPER ONLY**
Sends an announcement to the main server
Format: `msg!announce (announcement)`
